original: Nokilesaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanokilesaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: no kilesam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na no kilesam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyāḥ nava pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava

original: Nasaṅkilesikaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naasaṅkilesikaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na saṅkilesikam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na asaṅkilesikam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naasaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na saṅkiliṭṭham na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na asaṅkiliṭṭham na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe āsevane ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Nakilesasampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakilesavippayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kilesa sampayuttam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na kilesa vippayuttam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Nakilesañceva naasaṅkilesikañca nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naasaṅkilesikañceva nano ca kilesaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kilesam ca iva na asaṅkilesikam ca na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na asaṅkilesikam ca iva na no ca kilesam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyāḥ nava pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava

original: Nakilesañceva naasaṅkiliṭṭhañca nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naasaṅkiliṭṭhañceva
analyzed: na kilesam ca iva na a saṅkiliṭṭham ca na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na a saṅkiliṭṭham ca iva

original: nano ca kilesaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakilesañceva nakilesavippayuttañca
analyzed: na no ca kilesam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na kilesam ca iva na kilesa vippayuttam ca

original: nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakilesavippayuttañceva nano ca kilesaṁ nakusalaṁ
analyzed: na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na kilesa vippayuttam ca iva na no ca kilesam na kusala
dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava vipākam natthi

original: Kilesavippayuttaṁ nasaṅkilesikaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… kilesavippayuttaṁ
analyzed: kilesa vippayuttam na saṅkilesikam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe kilesa vippayutta

original: naasaṅkilesikaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe
analyzed: na asaṅkilesikam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe
dve pe āsevane ekam pe avigate pañca
